body_html:
In future, please can you ask general questions like this on StackOverflow. This is not a bug/issue.

The Conv2D timings shown in the Timeline do not include host/GPU transfers. These always happen within Send/Recv ops. They DMA timings will show up in the timelines labeled /gpu:0/memcpy (and also in the timeline for the stream which was used)

body:
In future, please can you ask general questions like this on StackOverflow.  This is not a bug/issue.

The Conv2D timings shown in the Timeline do not include host/GPU transfers.  These always happen within Send/Recv ops.  They DMA timings will show up in the timelines labeled /gpu:0/memcpy (and also in the timeline for the stream which was used)
